longBusinessSummary: CIMC Vehicles (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of semi-trailers and truck bodies for specialty vehicles in China, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company offers container chassis, flatbed, side-wall, and stake trailers; curtain-side, van, and refrigerated trailers; liquid and dry bulk tank trailers; and center-axle car carriers and terminal trailers. It also provides truck bodies for urban dump trucks and fully-assembled vehicles of cement mixers. In addition, the company develops, produces, and sells various special vehicles, mechanical products, and metal structure parts, as well as passenger and tank transport vehicles; processes machines; and operates in the import and export business. Further, it engages sales of cars, auto parts, metal materials, hardware and electrical equipment, electromechanical equipment, and components; wholesale and retail of products; import and export of technologies and trade agency; and provision of information and trade consulting services. Additionally, the company leases logistics equipment and provides storage services. It markets and sells its products under the Tonghua, Huajun, SCVC SAILING, Ruijiang Vehicles, Lingyu Vehicles, and Liangshan Dongyue brands in China; and Vanguard, CIE, SDC, and LAG brands internationally. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tianda Heavy Industries Ltd. and changed its name to CIMC Vehicles (Group) Co., Ltd. in May 2005. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. CIMC Vehicles (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China International Marine Containers (Group) Co., Ltd.
address2: No. 2 Gangwan Avenue Shekou Industrial Zone Nanshan District
